QueryDefinition.Query: select p.patid, p.yob, p.mob, p.pracid, case when p.gender = 2 then 'F' when p.gender = 1 then 'M' else 'Unknown' end as gender, cprd_ddate, p.regstartdate as OBSERVATION_PERIOD_START_DATE, case when p.regenddate is NULL then pr.lcd when pr.lcd is NULL then p.regenddate when pr.lcd < p.regenddate then pr.lcd when p.regenddate < pr.lcd then p.regenddate end as OBSERVATION_PERIOD_END_DATE, 32882 PeriodTypeConceptId, usualgpstaffid, p.acceptable FROM {sc}.patient p left join {sc}.practice pr on p.pracid = pr.pracid join {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.patid = ch.PERSON_ID order by p.patid
